html: 7.4.19  9:05 pm   in elementary school i played this game with a calculator where you press +1===========... and you see how high you can get but i spent an entire weekend doing it and i got something like 60,000 and the person i was playing with didn't even do it at all. it made me feel bad because it was a basically pointless task but since it was a competition it became fun except the person i was competing against wasn't even playing at all. it's like i didn't get the credit for winning since my opponent wasn't even playing to begin with. have you ever felt this way before?
